Title: Conveyor Belt
Description:
Allows to transport items. You can use R to change the start/end rotation, C to place checkpoints and F to flip the orientation.

Once you have unlocked layers, use E and Q while dragging to transport items between layers.

Title: Extractor
Description: Extracts shapes, needs to be placed on a shape patch.

Title: Belt Lift
Description: Tranports items between layers

Title: Splitter
Description: Allows to split a belt into multiple belts.

Title: Cutter
Description: Cuts shapes into half, independent of its rotation.

Title: Merger
Description: Allows to merge conveyor belts.

Title: Rotater
Description: Rotates the shape content, but keeps the orientation of the origin indicator.

Title: Pipe
Description:
Allows to transport fluids. You can use R to change the start/end rotation, C to place checkpoints and F to flip the orientation.

Once you have unlocked layers, use E and Q while dragging to transport fluids between layers.

Title: Pump
Description: Allows to extract fluids, needs to be placed on a fluid patch.

Title: Color Mixer
Description: Allows to mix colors using additive color mixing (RGB).

Title: Painter
Description: Allows to paint shapes.

Title: Belt Catapults
Description: RANGE IS LESS THAN SHOWN! Allows to transport shapes between islands.

Title: Hub
Description: The central hub.

Title: Pipe Pump
Description: Allows to transport fluids between layers.

Title: Pipe Down
Description: Allows to transport fluids between layers.

Title: [[building.ArtistPlaygroundBuilding.title]]
Description: [[building.ArtistPlaygroundBuilding.description]]

Title: Fluid Tank
Description: Allows to store fluids.

Title: Fluid Filler
Description: Allows to fill fluids into barrels.

Title: Fluid Drainer
Description: Allows to drain barrels.

Title: Storage
Description: Allows to buffer shapes.

Title: Item Producer (Sandbox)
Description: Allows to produce a given shape infinitely.

Title: Fluid Producer (Sandbox)
Description: Allows to produce a given fluid infinitely.

Title: Stacker
Description: Allows to stack one shape on top of another. Depending on their shape, they either merge or stack.

Title: Hydraulic Press
Description: Allows to produce barrels from shapes to transport fluids between islands.

Title: Pin Pusher
Description: Removes one quadrant and instead replaces it with a pin, allowing to create floating layers.

Title: Trash Can
Description: Allows to get rid of any waste into the void.

Title: Belt Reader
Description: Reports the current belt speed and allows reading the belt contents via wires.

Title: Label
Description: Allows to configure a text to show as a label.

Title: Crystal Generator
Description: EXPERIMENTAL. Fills empty spots with crystals.
